Bash("C:/Users/ramos/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python313/python.exe" -c "
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import math
img = Image.new\(''RGBA'', \(25, 26\), \(0, 0, 0, 0\)\)
draw = ImageDraw.Draw\(img\)
teal = \(0, 209, 169, 255\)

cx, cy = 12, 13
rx, ry = 9, 8
for t in range\(0, 360, 2\):
    rad = math.radians\(t\)
    x = cx + rx * math.cos\(rad\)
    y = cy + ry * math.sin\(rad\)
    if 0 <= x < 25 and 0 <= y < 26:
        img.putpixel\(\(int\(x\), int\(y\)\), teal\)

for t in [0, 60, 120, 180, 240, 300]:
    rad = math.radians\(t\)
    dx = int\(cx + rx * math.cos\(rad\)\)
    dy = int\(cy + ry * math.sin\(rad\)\)
    for ox in range\(-2, 3\):
        for oy in range\(-2, 3\):
            px, py = dx + ox, dy + oy
            if 0 <= px < 25 and 0 <= py < 26 and ox*ox + oy*oy <= 4:
                img.putpixel\(\(px, py\), teal\)

img.save\(''H:/Git_Overture/QML-SnippetsExamples/imports/assets/icons/pathview.png''\)
print\(''Icon saved''\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/ramos/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python313/python.exe" -c "
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
img = Image.new\(''RGBA'', \(25, 26\), \(0, 0, 0, 0\)\)
draw = ImageDraw.Draw\(img\)
teal = \(0, 209, 169, 255\)

# GridView icon: 3x3 grid of small squares
gap = 2
size = 6
offset_x = 2
offset_y = 3
for r in range\(3\):
    for c in range\(3\):
        x = offset_x + c * \(size + gap\)
        y = offset_y + r * \(size + gap\)
        draw.rectangle\([x, y, x + size - 1, y + size - 1], fill=teal\)

img.save\(''H:/Git_Overture/QML-SnippetsExamples/imports/assets/icons/gridview.png''\)
print\(''Icon saved''\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/ramos/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python313/python.exe" -c "
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
img = Image.new\(''RGBA'', \(25, 26\), \(0, 0, 0, 0\)\)
draw = ImageDraw.Draw\(img\)
teal = \(0, 209, 169, 255\)

# Shaders icon: diamond/sparkle shape
draw.polygon\([\(12, 1\), \(18, 8\), \(12, 15\), \(6, 8\)], fill=teal\)
# Small sparkle dots
draw.ellipse\([2, 17, 6, 21], fill=teal\)
draw.ellipse\([18, 17, 22, 21], fill=teal\)
draw.ellipse\([10, 20, 14, 24], fill=teal\)

img.save\(''H:/Git_Overture/QML-SnippetsExamples/imports/assets/icons/shaders.png''\)
print\(''Icon saved''\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/ramos/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python313/python.exe" -c "
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
img = Image.new\(''RGBA'', \(25, 26\), \(0, 0, 0, 0\)\)
draw = ImageDraw.Draw\(img\)
teal = \(0, 209, 169, 255\)

# Images icon: picture frame with mountain/sun
draw.rectangle\([2, 4, 22, 22], outline=teal, width=2\)
# Sun
draw.ellipse\([5, 7, 11, 13], fill=teal\)
# Mountain
draw.polygon\([\(4, 20\), \(12, 10\), \(20, 20\)], fill=teal\)
draw.polygon\([\(12, 20\), \(17, 13\), \(22, 20\)], fill=teal\)

img.save\(''H:/Git_Overture/QML-SnippetsExamples/imports/assets/icons/images.png''\)
print\(''Icon saved''\)
")
